title: @API Dev Team | Question to guild details api

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: It’s coming with the new guild APIs which are still in a bit of flux due to some backend changes w.r.t how guilds work. No ETA.

comments.author: Georgienna.1786
comments.body:
can u add the Player with Leader status in the api? Cause i need it for my website and Ramon Domke said to me i schould ask here :-P

example:
{
“guild_id”: “75FD83CF-0C45-4834-BC4C-097F93A487AF”,
“guild_name”: “Veterans Of Lions Arch”,
“tag”: “LA”,
“emblem”: {
“background_id”: 27,
“foreground_id”: 114,
“flags”: [],
“background_color_id”: 11,
“foreground_primary_color_id”: 584,
“foreground_secondary_color_id”: 64
}
“leader”: {
“account_name_01”: "Name.1234”,
“account_name_02”: "Name.1234”,
“account_name_03”: "Name.1234”,
“account_name_04”: "Name.1234”,
“account_name_05”: "Name.1234”,
“account_name_06”: "Name.1234”,
“account_name_07”: "Name.1234”,
…etc.
}
}

thx and greets
